description: The AWS::DocDB::GlobalCluster resource represents an Amazon DocumentDB Global Cluster.

GlobalClusterIdentifier.description: The cluster identifier of the global cluster.
GlobalClusterIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The cluster identifier of the global cluster.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z]{1}(?:-?[a-zA-Z0-9]){0,62}$  
Update requires: Replacement

SourceDBClusterIdentifier.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to use as the primary cluster of the global cluster. You may also choose to instead specify the DBClusterIdentifier. If you provide a value for this parameter, don't specify values for the following settings because Amazon DocumentDB uses the values from the specified source DB cluster: Engine, EngineVersion, StorageEncrypted
SourceDBClusterIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to use as the primary cluster of the global cluster. You may also choose to instead specify the DBClusterIdentifier. If you provide a value for this parameter, don't specify values for the following settings because Amazon DocumentDB uses the values from the specified source DB cluster: Engine, EngineVersion, StorageEncrypted

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Engine.description: The database engine to use for this global cluster.
Engine.markdownDescription:
The database engine to use for this global cluster.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: docdb  
Update requires: Replacement

EngineVersion.description: The engine version to use for this global cluster.
EngineVersion.markdownDescription:
The engine version to use for this global cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

DeletionProtection.description: Indicates whether the global cluster has deletion protection enabled. The global cluster can't be deleted when deletion protection is enabled.
DeletionProtection.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether the global cluster has deletion protection enabled. The global cluster can't be deleted when deletion protection is enabled.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

StorageEncrypted.description: Indicates whether the global cluster has storage encryption enabled.
StorageEncrypted.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether the global cluster has storage encryption enabled.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: The tags to be assigned to the Amazon DocumentDB resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags to be assigned to the Amazon DocumentDB resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

GlobalClusterResourceId.description: The AWS Region-unique, immutable identifier for the global database cluster. This identifier is found in AWS CloudTrail log entries whenever the AWS KMS key for the DB cluster is accessed.
GlobalClusterResourceId.markdownDescription:
The AWS Region-unique, immutable identifier for the global database cluster. This identifier is found in AWS CloudTrail log entries whenever the AWS KMS key for the DB cluster is accessed.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

GlobalClusterArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the global cluster.
GlobalClusterArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the global cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with an Amazon DocumentDB resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with an Amazon DocumentDB resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

GlobalClusterResourceId.description: The AWS Region-unique, immutable identifier for the global database cluster. This identifier is found in AWS CloudTrail log entries whenever the AWS KMS key for the DB cluster is accessed.
GlobalClusterResourceId.markdownDescription:
The AWS Region-unique, immutable identifier for the global database cluster. This identifier is found in AWS CloudTrail log entries whenever the AWS KMS key for the DB cluster is accessed.
